readability_reflection: I prefer concatenation as the plus symbols just make it easier for me personally to see what's a part of what.
comprehension_debugging: I did take a bit of time trying to figure out in the concatenation cases whether it was straight up writing the word or not and whether the curly brackets were actually parentheses.
preference_rationale: I would prefer concatenation simply because I find the plus signs easier to find and read than curly brackets.
learning_curve: I've always used string concatenation prior to this, so concatenation is a much more unfamiliar syntax to me.
suggestions_improvement: I just think, that when there are parentheses on the same line, the curly brackets in interpolation make code much harder to read.
